LanguageData.ODBL_enableDynamicLighting_desc: When enabled, lighting updates in real-time as doors open and close, allowing light to pass through open doors dynamically.
LanguageData.ODBL_disableDynamicLighting_label: Only update lighting when doors open and close
LanguageData.ODBL_updateInterval_desc: The number of ticks between light updates while doors are opening/closing. Lower is smoother but may impact performance.
